about_the_game:
This is a shooting game and survival game. In this game, you can experience the joy of killing a lot of enemies.

That you need to do is as much as possible to survive. Make yourself stronger and destroy more enemies.

You can see that the enemiescome from the sea.There are a lot of robots would attacking you. If you cannot destroy them, they will destroy you.

You can get talent points by killing them.And you can improve your ability by using these talent points.

This time, in addition to changing Shine's talent points, you can also configure many weapons and equipment.
You can change the main weapon, auxiliary weapon, and attachment to improve your battle effectiveness.
You can win the game by more proficient operation and more powerful equipment.

Powerful bosses can make the game more challenging.
Once you are familiar with this game, there is still survival mode waiting for you.
Enjoy youselves.
